Description:
Job summary: Control and manage project costs and support the project team in all commercial matters from initiation to close out for projects in scope.
Responsible for company infrastructure projects in Qatar.Skills
Skills:
8+ years of relevant work experience in cost control or Quantity Surveying related functions; experience with consultants/clients preferable
Experience in preparing comprehensive cost-related reports and presenting to management.
Advanced skills in commercial management and contract practice
Advanced computer skills and proficiency in MS Office and business-related software
Familiar with international standards used in local and international projects.
Finance, Legal, Development, Project Delivery, Audit, other Procurement functions
Bachelor's degree in engineering or quantity Surveying/Construction Management
